channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The gap between low- and high-performing students in the US has never been wider
item.description: New results from a national exam find that America’s children have continued to lose ground on reading skills in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and...

item.title: Caroline Kennedy brands RFK a 'predator' before confirmation hearing
item.description: In a scathing letter, Caroline Kennedy urges US senators not to confirm her cousin for a top health job.

item.title: RFK Jr.'s raspy voice is the result of a condition called spasmodic dysphonia. What is it?
item.description: Spasmodic dysphonia is a rare neurological disorder that causes a strained voice. RFK Jr. says he has had the disorder for decades and treats it with ...

item.title: RFK Jr. says he'll fix the overdose crisis. Critics say his plan is risky
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. survived heroin addiction and says that if confirmed as head of the Department of Health and Human Services, he'll build treatme...

item.title: OpenAI says Chinese rivals using its work for their AI apps
item.description: ChatGPT maker says it will need extra protection from US government, following emergence of Chinese rival, DeepSeek.

item.title: Watch Live: RFK Jr. confirmation hearing for Health Secretary underway in Senate
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces the Senate Finance Committee today in the first of two confirmation hearings.

item.title: How to avoid falling for ghost job opportunities
item.description: As job seekers face mounting pressure, many are finding themselves applying for positions that don't actually exist. Career expert Erin McGoff weighs ...

item.title: 66 million years ago, a fish chewed up and spit out food. It's now a fossil in Denmark
item.description: The fossil was found at a cliff in Denmark. Fossilized vomit is called regurgitalite, and it's a type of trace fossil, which tells scientists about an...

item.title: A $4B settlement for Hawaii wildfire victims is in legal limbo as an unusual trial starts
Trump signs an order restricting gender-affirming care for minors
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order seeking to end gender-affirming medical treatments for children and teenagers under the age of 19.

item.title: Warner grills RFK Jr. about federal funding freeze
item.description: Sen. Mark Warner (D-Virginia) pressed Robert F. Kennedy Jr. during his Senate confirmation hearing about a number of subjects, but mainly the Trump ad...

item.title: Two ways Trump aims to reshape government. And, how U.S. children are doing in school
item.description: President Trump's actions this week reveal his broad effort to reshape the federal government. And, the new Nation's Report Card shows the pandemic's ...

item.title: Dozens killed in stampede at massive Kumbh Mela Hindu festival in India
item.description: A senior police officer said at least 30 people died as a crowd panicked at the Hindu Kumbh Mela mega-festival in the northern city of Prayagraj.

item.title: Congolese president snubs peace talks over Goma crisis
item.description: The announcement comes as M23 rebels tightened their control over Goma city, seizing its airport.

item.title: 14 religious sect members convicted over diabetic girl's death
item.description: Elizabeth Rose Struhs, 8, died at her family's home after six days without her prescribed insulin shots for type-1 diabetes.

item.title: Flawed emergency alert systems lagged when residents needed them most during Los Angeles wildfires
Hamilton crashes Ferrari in pre-season testing
item.description: Lewis Hamilton is unhurt after crashing his Ferrari during the Formula 1 team's pre-season testing programme in Spain.

item.title: Garmin users say smartwatches have stopped working
item.description: Its Fenix 8 smartwatches, which retail for just under £1,000, are some of the devices to have issues.
